data:
type: "Application"
serviceRef: "<+input>"
environmentRef: "<+input>"
sources:
  healthSources:
  - identifier: "AppD"
    type: "AppDynamics"
    spec:
      applicationName: "<+input>"
      tierName: "<+input>"
      metricDefinitions:
      - identifier: "appdMetric"
        completeMetricPath: "<+input>"
        analysis:
          deploymentVerification:
            serviceInstanceMetricPath: "<+input>"
      connectorRef: "<+input>"
